group_1.textRight: We finally beat 'em…

group_1.textLeft: All I can do is give you my apologies…
No, I need to do more than that.
Would you like some candy?@Or perhaps some other treat?
Or if you wanted to learn how to read and@write for yourself, I'd be happy to teach you.

group_1.textRight: No, I'm good. So long as you're here@with me, Tsuyu…

group_1.textLeft: …Is that really enough?

group_1.textRight: Yeah…
Besides, I owe you an apology too...

group_1.textLeft: Whatever for…?

group_1.textRight: Because I disappeared on purpose.

group_1.textLeft: What…?

group_1.textRight: Then I wandered around from place to place,@slaying Demons along the way…

group_1.textLeft: Then the incident at Mizuna Shrine didn't@start yesterday.
I assumed you'd been fighting the Demon@all that time...
But onto the important matter: why did you@vanish and worry me so?!
Did I do something to offend you?

group_1.textRight: No…

group_1.textLeft: Then why…?

group_1.textRight: …Because I wanted you to come find me.

group_1.textLeft: …[wait:0.8][chara:104500:cheek_0][chara:104500:face_mtn_ex_030.exp3.txt][chara:104500:motion_100][chara:104500:lipSynch_1]I don't understand.

group_1.textRight: Because, well…
Because you're all about protecting@things, Tsuyu.

group_1.textLeft: Erm…what…?

group_1.textRight: You keep saying I'm strong and I'll be fine@on my own,
and I'm really happy when you say that…@but still!
I don't want to be dependent on you, Tsuyu,@it's just…!
It's just, somehow…
I don't know, I just want you to want@to protect me too…

group_1.textLeft: [chara:104500:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
…Um, so what you're saying is…
I was trying to protect so many other things@that you got jealous…?
Pfft… Ahaha!

group_1.textRight: [chara:104600:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]*Gasp*

group_1.textLeft: You are simply adorable.

group_1.textRight: Shut the hell up!

group_1.textLeft: Do you need me to give you more attention?

group_1.textRight: I'M GONNA KILL YOU!

group_1.textLeft: Ahaha, I'm sorry.@But still, I'm glad.
I had no idea you were so fond of me.

group_1.textRight: Ah, yeah…

group_1.textLeft: I'm sorry for what I did to you.@We'll both be more careful going forward.
From now on, Chizuru, if there's something@you wish to tell me, do so without restraint.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I think I caused a lot of trouble for@the poor guy from the Taito Gang, too.
I'll be more careful from now on…

group_1.textLeft: Onward and upward, then.

group_1.textRight: Please take care of me.

group_1.textCenter: Chizuru is so childish for testing me@with Demons.
